HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Free with Allegro Smart! subscription. Standard pricing is not available on the page.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Same-day delivery is mentioned as a possibility ('Doručení bez starostí již v den objednání'), but specific conditions are not available.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Free with Allegro Smart! subscription. Standard pricing is not available on the page.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: The original MALL stores are now part of the Allegro partner network, not a distinct in-store pickup option.

SUMMARY: Mall.cz has merged with Allegro.cz, and all shipping is now handled through the Allegro platform. The website offers home delivery and pickup from a wide network of partner points ('Široká síť partnerských prodejen a výdejních míst'). Detailed information on specific couriers, standard pricing, and delivery times is not available on the provided landing page. NOTABLE FEATURES: The main shipping incentive is the 'Allegro Smart!' subscription, which offers free delivery and returns on eligible items. The platform also advertises the possibility of same-day delivery. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The mall.cz page serves as a transitional portal to Allegro.cz. It lacks a dedicated, detailed shipping information section. To understand the full range of shipping options and costs, a user must proceed to the Allegro.cz platform and likely begin the checkout process, as the information is not readily accessible.
